channel.title: Hugo on Einar Holsbø
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Einar Holsbø

item.title: Changing website framework from Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: I decided to move away from Jekyll as a framework for running this website as I had some gemfile problems (now ruby doesn’t work at all for arcane reasons) and I figured it would be saner, simpler, and faster to just stop using something ruby-based. The switch to Hugo took a couple of hours where most of it went into (i) picking a theme and (ii) making sure the blog posts still work.
